message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a special introductory price of $150. It's a fantastic deal for something of this quality. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer.  While I understand your budget, $150 is already a very competitive price for this item. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $125?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I would like to counter with an offer of $110. This allows me to stay within my budget while still showing appreciation for the quality of the product.
